dcterms:creator: Alireza Bayat
Stavros Gaitanaros
dcterms:description: A dataset containing designs of acoustic metamaterials with varying geometries and their corresponding bandgap data, used for training a random forest model to predict bandgap existence.
dcterms:title: Acoustic Metamaterials Design Dataset

dcterms:creator: John Brian Pendry
dcterms:description: A dataset related to optical metasurfaces, focusing on designs that achieve high absorbance at specified wavelengths, used for training a random forest model to predict high absorbance.
dcterms:title: Optical Metasurfaces Design Dataset

dcterms:creator: Yichi Zhang
Daniel W Apley
Wei Chen
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created using a squared exponential function to mimic the quantitative functional response of metamaterials, used for training and testing inverse design models.
dcterms:title: SqExp Synthetic Dataset

dcterms:creator: Yichi Zhang
Daniel W Apley
Wei Chen
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created using a superposed sine function to produce qualitative responses for inverse design problems, used for training and testing models.
dcterms:title: SupSin Synthetic Dataset
